name: Santa Lost His Presents! (My First UE5 Game)
name_original: Santa Lost His Presents! (My First UE5 Game)
description:
Santa Lost His Presents

A Small, Fun, kinda stupid game made by myself. 

You Must find all of the Presents and each round try to beat you own time record. If you want more description and updates and more gameplay like new levels, more easter eggs, expanded menu, settings menu... just tell me.

If I didn't add more stuff it's because this is actually a project for my school so I had a pretty close deadline and didn't want to get into too much indev.

(ALSO) Sorry for the Size being 1GB, it's the smallest size I could get after purging Unreal Engine.
